title: Coconut Oil Candies (aka Fat Bombs)
directions: Mix all ingredients together in a bowl or food processor until mixture is smooth.
Drop by the tablespoon onto waxed or parchment paper, or into the dessicated coconut.
Refrigerate until the candies are solid, then store in a covered container in the fridge.
ingredients: 1 cup softened (not melted) cold pressed virgin coconut oil
1-2 Tbsp equivalent to sugar or your sweetener of choice (I used Confectioner's Swerve)
2 Tbsp almond butter or other nut butter
Optional-unsweetened dessicated coconut (for rolling or sprinkling)
